data.name: Article01P01

data.name: Article01P02
data.value: China,Japan and South Korea exchange sometimes in history, sometimes antagonistic, mutually influential, but also has the use of Chinese characters, chopsticks, soy sauce, etc. with a common tradition. Conception LOCUS DESIGN FORUM is designed to enable extraction from the Western culture of modernism, and its integration into the local culture after their own way to respond to these three countries, as a rational and emotional characters civilized coexistence circle, in clear itself At the same location as the present and the future release of information platform and a common culture play a role. "LOCUS" once "position" and "local" a combination of the Latin Chinese "place" means. Historian Toynbee once said, the fate of civilization depends on the "challenge" and "response." The forum will challenge and respond deemed its mission, to carry out various activities.

data.name: Article02P01
data.value: "Paper non-paper - paper art exhibition in China and Japan Paper Art Exhibition first back" on January 13, 2012 at the opening of the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the exhibition is composed of the Central Academy of Fine Arts and the Tokyo University of the Arts co-sponsored, in this exhibition we see as the most suitable for household art materials, paper, the original has unlimited possibilities.

data.name: Article02P02
data.value: Paper as we know it is a very strong plasticity of the material, the use of paper material as furniture raw materials, with the protection of the ecological environment, energy conservation, rich variety of furniture and other characteristics.

data.name: Article02P03
data.value: Nowadays more and more young people concerned about the paper furniture, they advocate natural, environmentally friendly, healthy home,

data.name: Article02P04
data.value: Exhibition concept:

data.name: Article02P05
data.value: As an important carrier of oriental art, "paper" in Chinese and Japanese art has a strong tradition, for the use of paper, including China, Japan and throughout Asia, including the common characteristics of art. After more than a year organization plan "paper non-paper - In Japanese Paper Art Exhibition" was able in Beijing Central Academy of Fine Art Museum.

data.name: Article02P06
data.value: The exhibition around the "paper" concept, to explore "paper" and the possibility to express cultural connotation of "paper" in the contemporary cultural context, but also based on "paper Non-paper" as the first of the Eastern spiritual themes in Japan and other issues of common concern were discussed in a meaningful artistic practice. "Paper" is an important carrier of oriental art, has been widely used since ancient times, the Chinese invented paper, the seventh century, when paper spread to Japan, the paper is one of the most important mediums record and performance in the East Asian civilization. "Non-paper" is but one of the meaning and ideas about the "paper" on paper other than the media, to convey, especially for the development of 20th-century art in Asia is at the core of the paper is different from that of Western modernity road.

data.name: Article02P07
data.value: Along with economic globalization, the East Asian countries to learn from the West - especially China and Japan, more and more attention to the subject of their own culture, with a "paper" to express the spirit of the East, can be said to establish its own unique culture value. More than ten years there have been many international art discussion about the art of paper (Paper Art), and also held many exhibitions related to paper; discussion paper art generally includes two aspects: First Paper Art (Art on Paper ), including various forms of painting, photography and so on; the second is a paper medium (Paper as Media, or Art in Paper), including painting, sculpture, installations, comprehensive material works and so on.

data.name: Article02P08
data.value: The China and Japan Paper Art Exhibition in the first round, on the basis of these two concepts, we propose a new concept - the concept paper (Paper as Concept), and thus lead to the exhibition's theme: "non-paper paper "(Paper, Non Paper). "Paper Non-paper" means paper is not just paper, "paper" means paper related with "non-paper" meant nothing to do with the paper, "paper Non-paper" means paper more possibilities of art, It means "no" and also means "there."

data.name: Article02Title
data.value: 2012 "paper non-paper" in China and Japan Paper Art Exhibition

data.name: Article03P01
data.value: First China International Corrugated expand founded in 2001, a total of 171 corrugated manufacturing equipment and consumables suppliers participating. Development until 2011, the China International Exhibition corrugated over 550 exhibitors, it is the first exhibition of three times. Today, China has not only SinoCorrugated China and the global corrugated industry's leading event, but also the fastest-growing professional event corrugated box industry.

data.name: Article03P02
data.value: The number of visitors Chinese SinoCorrugated greater growth rates. In 2001, a total of 4,275 professional visitors from the corrugated box industry visited the exhibition. After ten years to 2011 China International Corrugated Show, the number of visitors increased by nearly six-fold, to 22,251 people.

data.name: Article03P03
data.value: April 8, 2013 morning, by the Reed-sponsored the "2013 China International Corrugated Show" at the Shanghai New International Expo Center kicked off. Corrugated extension for the current April 8, 2013 - 11 days, an exhibition area of 61,700 square meters, bringing together more than 600 from China and around the world supplier of corrugated equipment and consumables manufacturers and paper suppliers.

data.name: Article03P04
data.value: SinoCorrugated provide industry professionals the latest manufacturing technology, industry trends, global trends, as well as opportunities to expand in emerging markets an important opportunity. Exhibition showcasing more than 1,000 species of corrugated box manufacturing solutions, gathered corrugated industry leading supplier of equipment and supplies, and the Asia-Pacific region has a high purchasing power of professional buyers and traders to build their communication and trade exchanges between the solid platform.

data.name: Article05P01
data.value: To cut Yichun word, chill people scissors. In the Tang Dynasty poet Cui Tao Rong handed down poems, written in these two quite life charm. Poem "Yichun word" is that we are now well-known paper-cut.

data.name: Article05P02
data.value: Paper-cut, also known as engraved paper, is one of the oldest and most traditional folk art and its history can be traced back to the 6th century AD. Paper-cut origin, initially for ritual sacrifice, hollow into a variety of patterns on paper, in order to move the soul ancestors. With the development of society, paper-cut gradually shifted from ritual function landscaping features. On the windows, lintels, red, white wedding occasions everywhere exquisite paper-cut, ordinary people who witnessed the emotions

data.name: Article05P03
data.value: 2006, paper-cut is included in the "first batch of national intangible cultural heritage", so that the two folk paper-cut artist was "both happy and worried." The joy is that this ancient craft has been more and more attention; the worry is also meant to be included in the list are in the process of disappearing paper-cut state, authorities hope that in this way it passed along.

data.name: Article05P04
data.value: After being included in the paper-cut national non-heritage list soon, 唐爱春 also declare their paper-cut works to the relevant departments. In the efforts of all parties, the state has been successfully selected paper cutting Guangxi intangible cultural heritage. Her works were sent to the National Museum of Guangxi, Shanxi Youyu County Clerk will cut art and many other units, as works of art permanently preserved.

data.name: Article05Title
data.value: Explore the traditional process of Guilin fingertips: folk paper-cut

data.name: Article06P01
data.value: One of the four famous Chinese inventions - papermaking, has been nineteen hundred years of history. While it has long been using modern industrial equipment to produce paper, but Ma Village in Longsheng County Longji town, and the Mengcun Longsheng town, there continues to this day folk handmade paper. However, due to the complex process, not economic, such "antique" traditional hand papermaking, despite a whole village to bring up the last large-scale production of prosperity, but now has very few of the workshops. Recently, this reporter went to the village of Dragon Town mohair, visit handmade paper workshop, feel the charm of traditional hand papermaking process.

data.name: Article06P02
data.value: Drain water wet paper still bonded together, difficult to separate from the paper to be at the head with pliers pliers to open a picture, sorting.

data.name: Article06P03
data.value: Meng Huan Bin couples will drain through the wet paper separated one by one, in a cool dry places, so that the sheet to dry, to prevent wrinkling.

data.name: Article06P04
data.value: Handmade paper Square is spread far and few in the private sector an ancient civilization can be saved here so authentic handmade paper craft, is entirely a miracle. Currently, the village is a positive declaration mohair intangible cultural heritage to be protected, while relying on eco-tourism approach, inherit and continue this tradition craft.

data.name: Article10P01
data.value: Huajiang campus library is one of the largest monomer construction in colleges and universities library, the building area of 42000 square meters. Library has offices, technical information department, editorial department, circulation department, reading department, huajiang campus management and other business department. Paper books collection of 1.74 million books, 1.23 million kinds of electronic books, foreign language core database 26, 45 Chinese database, chinese-foreign journals (including electronic journals) more than 19000. With advanced network information platform, all kinds of public service facilities.

data.name: Article10P02
data.value: Since 1995, the introduction of ILAS system, the realization of computer management, strive to build a digital library, the introduction of knowledge discovery system, RFID system, self-service printing system, mobile library, WeChat library, the construction of the efficient literature information center of personalized, intelligent, open, let the teachers and students is not subject to any restrictions, time and space at any can implement library and cloud library networking devices of various kinds of unified retrieval, full access to information resource and push service, offering online reading, full-text retrieval, offline borrowing, mobile reading, download, print and other digital content and knowledge service.

data.name: Article10P03
data.value: Library is the home of paper, paper shoulder the responsibility of the transfer of knowledge and power, the library of guangxi electric power between teachers and students built the feeling of a family full of knowledge. Here we study, here communication, bring the spirit of nutrient absorption paper here, here also continue to improve yourself. We are lucky, and do not need to transport volumes of books, also do not need scaling of borrowing books, more do not need grottoes to keep knowledge. Life in the 21st century we have paper from one of the most abundant resources, personal feel it brought about by the temperature.
